body: The program in the report seems fundamentally wrong. It makes a Alias which is *Foo, but then once gob indirects it has a Foo with an Encode method, which is going to put the recursion back. If you 'type Alias Foo', as in http://play.golang.org/p/Lby39nmUE0, then everything works today. There may be cause for a clearer error here but that's all.
